patthana17.2:1.1: Abyākataṁ vipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana17.2:2.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.2:3.1_0: Kusalaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.2:3.1_1: Kusalaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.2:3.1_2: Kusalaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo
patthana17.2:4.1_0: Akusalaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.2:4.1_1: Akusalaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.2:4.1_2: Akusalaṁ vipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo navipākadhammadhammo ca naakusalo navipākadhammadhammo
patthana17.2:5.1: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.2:6.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo
patthana17.2:6.1_3: paṭicca nakusalo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo ca naakusalo nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo
patthana17.2:6.1_4: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
